comment:
front-loading model:A type of washing machine where the door is located at the front of the machine, allowing for easier loading and unloading of laundry.
top-loading model:A type of washing machine where the door is located on the top of the machine, requiring users to reach down to load and unload laundry.
kWh:Kilowatt-hour, a unit of energy measurement commonly used to quantify electricity consumption.
